alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 02 at 7:42PM MDT until October 02 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT FOR EASTERN CUSTER AND SOUTH CENTRAL PENNINGTON COUNTIES... At 741 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Buffalo Gap, or 17 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. This severe storm will be near... Fairburn and southeastern Custer State Park around 745 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Folsom and Railroad Buttes. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
